title: PlotSquared 在地皮内怪物打不到玩家 后台提示报错
txt_content:
服务端类型：catserver   版本1.12、






[18:11:57] [Server thread/WARN]: Epic Siege Mod loaded a new chunk [-14, 11] in dimension 3 (overworld) while populating chunk [-14, 11], causing cascading worldgen lag.
[18:11:57] [Server thread/WARN]: Please report this to the mod's issue tracker. This log can be disabled in the Forge config.
[18:11:58] [Server thread/WARN]: Epic Siege Mod loaded a new chunk [-15, 11] in dimension 3 (overworld) while populating chunk [-15, 11], causing cascading worldgen lag.
[18:11:58] [Server thread/WARN]: Please report this to the mod's issue tracker. This log can be disabled in the Forge config.
[18:11:58] [Server thread/WARN]: Epic Siege Mod loaded a new chunk [-14, 10] in dimension 3 (overworld) while populating chunk [-14, 10], causing cascading worldgen lag.
[18:11:58] [Server thread/WARN]: Please report this to the mod's issue tracker. This log can be disabled in the Forge config.
[18:11:58] [Server thread/WARN]: Epic Siege Mod loaded a new chunk [-15, 10] in dimension 3 (overworld) while populating chunk [-14, 10], causing cascading worldgen lag.
[18:11:58] [Server thread/WARN]: Please report this to the mod's issue tracker. This log can be disabled in the Forge config.
[18:11:58] [Server thread/WARN]: Epic Siege Mod loaded a new chunk [-15, 10] in dimension 3 (overworld) while populating chunk [-15, 10], causing cascading worldgen lag.

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
原因 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-797425-1-1.html

config\forge.cfg 中设置     B:logCascadingWorldGeneration=false

即可关闭提示

地皮的问题，参照这里试试 https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-876849-1-1.html
